contest-event.event-date: Oct. 12, 1968 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Prelude to the Mastersingers (Die Meistersinger) Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK The winning band was declared World Champions as well as Champion Band of Great Britain. The Spotlight on Service was given to John Baldwin. Sept. 21, 2010, 11:49 a.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 3:10 p.m. 1 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Walter B.
